The main objective of EOR methods is to increase the overall recovery efficiency ( E), which may be quantified as the product of the macroscopic or volumetric displacement efficiency (EV) and the microscopic displacement efficiency (ED), as shown in Equation (1) [ 7]. A schematic illustration of the recovery process and specific definitions can be found in Figure 1.
